name: MedicinalProductPharmaceutical.routeOfAdministration.maxTreatmentPeriod
title: MedicinalProductPharmaceutical.routeOfAdministration.maxTreatmentPeriod
purpose: Data Elements are defined for each element to assist in questionnaire construction etc

element.short: The maximum treatment period during which an Investigational Medicinal Product can be administered as per the protocol referenced in the clinical trial authorisation
element.definition: The maximum treatment period during which an Investigational Medicinal Product can be administered as per the protocol referenced in the clinical trial authorisation.
